summary:
This mod will replace the Steel Shield with my New Shield.
I was disapointed to see that the steel shield in vanilla was not matching the Armor.
Now you can walk trough Skyrim in style with a full set of Steel armor that match together.
descriptionHtml:
Steel Shield Replacer 
By: Reaper9111


The mod:
This mod will replace the Steel Shield with my New Shield.
I was disapointed to see that the steel shield in vanilla was not matching the Armor.
Now you can walk trough Skyrim in style with a full set of Steel armor that match together.
If someone have the ability to work 3d program and would feel to help, it would be good to send me a convex version of this shield, no need to remodel a new one !

Updates:
V2
Normalmap has been updated with more details and the shield is less shiny !
The shield texture is a lil more darker to match the steel set even more !
There\'s a second model for those who doesnt like the first one !

Instalation:
Make a backup of the following files:
Meshes/Armor/Steel/Shield
Textures/Armor/Steel/Shiel.dds
Textures/Armor/Steel/Shield_n.dds
Just put the provided Meshes and Textures folder in your Skyrim Data.
And enjoy !

Uninstallation:
Replace the new files with the one you Copied !

Permission:
Ask me via msg on Nexus for any request !

Credits:
Bethesda
Gimp
Nifskope
Reaper9111
author: Reaper9111
